newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - AMD FY98 estimate raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - AMD FY98 estimate raised.

text.p: -- ABN AMRO Chicago Corp said Friday it raised its earnings estimate for Advanced Micro Devices Inc in fiscal 1998 to $4.40 a share from $3.50 to reflect new information gathered at the company's annual meeting earlier this week.

-- AMD said for the first time that up to 75 percent of its X86 microprocessors will be made under the new 0.25 micron process in 1998 and 100 percent will be made on 0.25 and 0.18 micron processes in 1998, ABN AMRO said.
-- ABN AMRO said the implications for the average selling price and gross margin for the new K6 chip is extremely positive. Gross margins in 1998 should easily be 52 percent, ABN AMRO said.
-- AMD is a manufacturer of semiconductors.
-- Its shares closed off 7/8 Friday at 40-5/8.
